overview: One of the world's greatest singer-songwriters, Joan Armatrading, does what she does best, accompanied by a full live band.  Filmed at Asylum Chapel, London, in 2021, the show contains a plethora of new songs and classic tracks from across Joan's successful career - including Better Life, Consequences, Love and Affection, Drop the Pilot, Down to Zero and Me, Myself, I.
title: Joan Armatrading at Asylum Chapel
